channel.title: Lucas Miranda's workspace
channel.description: Recent content on Lucas Miranda's workspace

item.title: Automatically annotated motion tracking identifies a distinct social behavioral profile following chronic social defeat stress
item.description: Here, we used our DeepOF software to gain novel insights into the social behavior of mice following chronic social defeat stress.

item.title: DeepOF
item.description: A suite for postprocessing time-series extracted from videos of freely moving rodents using DeepLabCut and SLEAP.

item.title: Neural Information Processing Systems 2023
item.description: My impressions, thoughts, and favourite papers on the 2023 edition of NeurIPS, which I attended in person in New Orleans.

item.title: Tropical Probabilistic AI summer school 2024
item.description: My impressions and thoughts on the Tropical Probabilistic AI summer school 2024, which I had the pleasure to attend in person!

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2024 J Bordes, T Bajaj, L Miranda, L van Doeselaar, L Brix, S Narayan, H Yang, S Mitra, V Kovarova, M Springer, K Kleigrewe, B Müller-Myhsok, N Gassen, MV Schmidt. “Sex-specific fear acquisition following early life stress is linked to amygdala glutamate metabolism.”, preprint in bioRxiv. Link to paper. 2023 A Kos & JP Lopez et al. “Early life adversity shapes social subordination and cell type–specific transcriptomic patterning in the ventral hippocampus”, in Science Advances.
